text: Ani (amhi) madayanakade tyance bha'u so'aiba yanna pathavile. So'aiba mhanale, he majhya janasamuhacya lokanno! Tumhi allahaci upasana kara, tyacyakherija tumaca konihi mabuda nahi tumacya palanakartyatarphe tumacyajavala spasta nisani ye'una pohocali ahe. Tevha tumhi mapa tola purepura karita ja, ani lokanna tyancya cija-vastu kami karuna de'u naka ani sarya dharativara, sudharana keli gelyanantara phasada (utpata-upadrava) pasaravu naka. He tumacyasathi labhadayaka ahe jara tumhi imana rakhala
